pages.title: Reef Triggerfish
pages.text: It is found at reefs in the Indo-Pacific and is the state fish of Hawaii.$(br2)The name humuhumunukunukuāpuaʻa serves for both singular and plural descriptions.$(br2)The fish shares its Hawaiian name with the lagoon triggerfish ($(o)R. aculeatus$()), another fish also found in the Indo-Pacific.
